Game.Name: Danny Phantom - The Ultimate Enemy (Europe) (En,De,Es)
Game.plot: The future is in peril! It's up to Danny to save his friends and family from the most dangerous force imaginable! Use all of Danny's paranormal powers including flying, phasing through walls and shooting ghostly beams. Transform into Danny Phantom. Battle enemy ghosts. Unleash super ghost powers.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/926198.htmlCheat: PasswordsEnter these in the Option menu.Cheat: Clockworks Time Quest/Mission ModeTo unlock Clockwork's Time Quest/Mission Mode, simply beat the game once on Normal difficulty. Once you do, go back to your saved game and Clockwork himself will fill you in on the rest. Then you're in Mission Mode. In this mode, you can also fight enemies from the past such as Skulker, Ember, and even The Box Ghost. This mode also has you do different things on the past levels to earn medals such as "Do NOT Use Plasma Powers" or "Beat 5 ghosts in under 30 seconds."
Game.Notes: The future is in peril! It's up to Danny to save his friends and family from the most dangerous force imaginable! Use all of Danny's paranormal powers including flying, phasing through walls and shooting ghostly beams. Transform into Danny Phantom. Battle enemy ghosts. Unleash super ghost powers.
